author: Levi Smith
comment: There are some awesome designs, but I don't like that the design partially overlaps the current time. It'd also be nice to have some extra customisation too.

author: Andrew Combs
comment: There are a few good faces, but I don't like most of them.

author: Alex T
comment: Love the designs, simple yet so unique

author: Blast Man
comment: I CAN'T FIND IT WHEN I DONLAOD

author: Greg Mahone II
comment: No to bad

author: Johan Agurén
comment: I haven't seen any other watch face using parallax scrolling hooked to the accelerometers. But I suppose that most Android users would like to change more than just 12/24h and random/static background. + for being free.
title: Nice but lacking in terms of customization

author: William Achukwu
comment: Beautiful first glimpse of what can be done with the new watch face API! Leaves you with a parallax effect when moving your watch. Also love the modern/edgy design. Great work! My only ask would be to remove certain watch faces from the random loop. I love having random enabled but I'm not too fond of specific watch faces.
title: Loved it

comment: I really love this set of watch faces. However, the lack of customization options sucks. I'd be willing to even pay for you guys to add option to disable parallax affect, day/date, and whitelist for random faces. Either way, great faces, keep it up!
title: Love the Look But..

author: Yash Bhan Singh
comment: Eats ram/CPU and makes my LG G watch's user experience slower like lag in transition of cards shown on it. And even drains battery too which ridiculously annoying damn please fix. Hence no response provided by dev so m just removing this face.
title: So u made me to uninstall this app congrats.

author: Duncan Maloney
comment: I like the design but faces simply don't show up on my watch, and LG G watch.  Maybe an update is needed to for the watch or the android wear app on my phone but as of yet, the watch face does not show up on my device.
title: doesn't work at least yet

author: Mo Al
comment: I've been waiting for this to work and got excited when the update came in, but its still not applicable. Waiting for a fix, will change rating once it works.
title: Still doesnt work on SW3-latest software

author: Hubert Golingan
comment: Very stylish watch faces and several to choose from. However,  several tweaks are necessary like the ability to turn off the gyroscope feature which I personally don't like. Another feature I'd like to see is better ambient mode designs, ie. a more simplified version of the applied watch face, or the ability to add the date. Other that, this is a must have for any android wear user.
title: Great watch faces

author: Matt C
comment: Looks great! However it would be nice to have more customization options such as changing the font color and disabling the parallax scrolling to save battery.

author: Anthony Dellavecchia
comment: The background doesn't change anymore. I reinstalled still doesn't work. Moto 360 with OPO.
title: Stuck on one background

author: Shelby Erickson
comment: Beautiful! Hoping they add ability to further customize - Date, weather, battery, etc...
title: Asus Zenwatch Issues?

author: J Makimbo
comment: Does not appear to work with my S3 running 4.3 says incompatible device, works on both my 4.4 Tablets, why not 4.3, I have the latestvandroid wear on my S3 and it is linked to my LGR with 5.0, many of the new watch faces are working so why not this?
title: Android 4.3

author: Jonathan Stinebaugh
comment: Very attractive looking design that is animated subtly with the gyroscope in the watch. Edit found in the wear app you can change the background from random!
title: Very nice looking

author: Jonathan Simon
comment: Dope watch face with the ability to randomize the background or set it to one particular background. Parallax is eye candy.  Despite some other reviews, this works fine on the Sony smartwatch 3 and is clear to read on the TFD when dim.
title: Great casual watch face

author: Laura Walters
comment: Running the lastest versions of all applicable software, this watch face does not show up on my Moto 360
title: Does not show up

author: Tristan Morris
comment: But not showing up on my watch or on the android wear app. Have newest firmware on watch and latest android wear update.
title: Have the latest version

author: C Hiebert
comment: Would like to see many of the designs in the inverted form such as the black and white swapped out for white and black. But I love the designs! Great job
title: Great design

author: Steve Tolnai jr
comment: Works beautifully on the LG watch I've had it now for two days and it hasn't  suck down the battery life on my watch at all. Highly recommend this app.
title: Awesome

author: Micheal Morhart
comment: Using this on the Sony smart watch 3. Works perfectly and has lots of different hundreds styled watch faces. I still maintain great battery life as well.
title: Works/looks amazing

author: Kevin Pagan
comment: Really like the watch faces but would be much better with the option to add Day/Date. Can you please add this?
title: Date

author: parker hurley
comment: I like the faces and you are able to pick just one face over the random faces now. Over all a pack to have
title: Very good

author: Perry Merrity II
comment: As much as I like randomization, it'd be neat if you could select a face to always appear
title: Neat

author: Joshua Low
comment: Tried looking in the Android Wear App & also my watch faces but it doesn't show up, why?
title: Doesn't show up

author: Luis Collymoore
comment: From the way it's designed to the background moving depending on the position you held your watch is awesome
title: Loved it

author: Pierre-Yves B.
comment: Seems to be completely abandoned. Uninstalling.
title: Abandoned

comment: Didn't think I'd like it so much, glad I downloaded it.
title: Really cool

author: Breydon Wilson
comment: Eye-pleasing faces with very effective parallax effect. 5 stars
title: Beautiful

author: Mack Masberg
comment: The designs are nice, even have a nice movement to them!
title: Great Watch Face

author: Michael Licud
comment: Nice face background but better if it has option to show the date
title: Great face

author: Adam Lukes
comment: Stop complaining about customization the watch is supposed to look good
title: Love it

author: Jonathan Vaval
comment: I live the hundreds
title: Dope

author: Riccardo Gioria
comment: But no customization, it could be better.
title: Really good

author: Kolby Fisher
comment: Will not show up on my phone nor my watch.

author: Kaelan Aker
comment: Good designs, needs more to it.
title: Needs more customization options

author: Joe Rios
comment: The parallax effect!
title: Diggin

author: Michael Maglione
comment: Just wish it had date and battery %
title: Awesome
